Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.gameboard

Class Itinerary

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.gameboard.Itinerary
public class Itinerary
extends Observable
Class Itinerary represents the player's itinerary on the game board.

  • Constructor Details

    • Itinerary

      public Itinerary​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Default constructor. Note that the black cross position is set to null.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player associated with the itinerary

  • Method Details

    • setBlackCrossPosition

      public void setBlackCrossPosition​(java.lang.Integer blackCrossPosition)
      Sets the black cross position and updates all players' virtual view of a new itinerary with a NewItinerary message. Used in the setup phase of a single player match.
      Parameters:
      blackCrossPosition - the new position for the black cross

    • notifyNew

      public void notifyNew​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Notifies a player's virtual view with a NewItinerary message. Used when player is reconnecting to a game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player to notify

    • getBlackCrossPosition

      public java.lang.Integer getBlackCrossPosition()
      Returns the black cross position on the itinerary.
      Returns:
      the black cross position

    • getPosition

      public int getPosition()
      Returns the player's position on the itinerary.
      Returns:
      the player's position

    • getCardStatus

      public CardStatus[] getCardStatus()
      Returns a copy of the array of papal card states.
      Returns:

    • setCardStatus

      public void setCardStatus​(CardStatus cardStatus, int index)
      Sets the state of a specified papal card.
      Parameters:
      cardStatus - the new state of the card
      index - the index of the card

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition​(int amountCross, java.lang.Integer amountBlack, boolean toNotify)
      Updates the position of the player's cross and the black cross (note that the maximum position 24). If necessary, it notifies all players' virtual views with a NewItinerary message.
      Parameters:
      amountCross - the amount of positions by which the player's cross will be increased
      amountBlack - the amount of positions by which the black cross will be increased
      toNotify - set to true if all players' virtual views need to be notified, false otherwise

    • toNotify

      public boolean toNotify​(int oldPosition, int amount)
      Checks if increasing the player's position on the itinerary will cause a change of state for one of the papal cards.
      Parameters:
      oldPosition - the old position of the player's cross
      amount - the amount of positions by which the player's cross will be increased
      Returns:
      false if increasing the position causes a change of state for a papal card, true otherwise
